page.title: 05Wildriggs
page.content: Penrith has a problem which has caused the people of the town to write at somelength to the local newspaper. This is not a reent problem, it has been going on for many years, although the ned to write to the newspaper has hot less and less. The problem - "The Smell". The smell comes from Wildriggs which is localy known as 'The bone factory'. It is the place where anything that can be used from dead carcassses is processed into animal products. In the past the prevaling south West wind would give the inhabitants of the town the full benifit of 'The Smell'. Now due to the efforts of Wildriggs the smell escapes very rarely, but when it does, it still prompts letter to the locl paper, as it is still a matter of concern.
